description: Officer Mario Cerciello Rega was stabbed to death after a drug deal gone wrong in central Rome.
title: Mario Cerciello Rega case: US students in Italian court over police murder
title_page: Mario Cerciello Rega case: US students in Italian court over police murder - BBC News
maintext: Rega's murder received huge amounts of attention in Italy. He had only just returned to duty from his honeymoon, and huge crowds turned out for his funeral at the same church where was married just 43 days before.
